page.title: 17SOCIETIES/CLUBS IN EARDISLEY
page.content: {The Royal British Legion}plays a big part in village life amongst the older population.As well as the main branch there is a womens section.There are 95 members who meet monthly and are very succesful in their charity fund raising.Members are from a wide area. {Eardisley snooker club}have 21 members and meet most evenings. {Eardisley rafting club}have 30 members both men and women who compete in the annual charity raft races on the Wye. {Eardisley singers}have 8 members who put on concerts of serious music. {Eardisley under fives}has about 20 children and 10 Mums.They meet on Wednesday mornings.This is a new group formed with the aid of money and support from the Leominster Marches project.This is a group set up in the area and financed from Leominster Council to aid rural life.
